resources.string: The widget will update more precisely, but it will drain more battery.
The widget will update less precisely, but it will save more battery.
Choose the date that is set to calculate the rest days
Choose the time that is set to calculate the rest time

-v1.2.0
	Add widget configuration
	Better service support for updating widget
	Let user change the base date and time
	Add Battery Save Mode
	Add developer info
-v1.2.1\n\tImprove the performance of requesting permission\n\tRepair the problem of SAVE BATTERY MODE\'s default value
-v1.2.2\n\tImprove the performance of background service\n\tAdd support to widget click event, now user can simply click the widget to open setting page
